attributes.action: Treat residents of England and Wales in the same way as those of Scotland and Northern Ireland by granting us all the same number of Bank Holidays in a year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Residents of Northern Ireland enjoy 10 Bank Holidays a year whilst those of Scotland have 9.  Those living in England and Wales however only receive 8 Bank Holidays a year.

Are we not all part of one United Kingdom?
